definition: خس kassa (1st pers. perf. kasistu) a (خسة kissa, خساسة kasāsa) to be mean, base, vile; to become less, decrease, diminish, depreciate, fall in value; -- kassa u to lessen, reduce, diminish (هـ s.th.) II to lessen, reduce, diminish (هـ s.th.) خس kass lettuce (Lactuca sativa; bot.) خس kassa (n. un.) head of lettuce خس kissa and خساسة kasāsa meanness, baseness, vileness
